abstract.text: Declare the data your app or third-party SDK collects in a privacy manifest.

metadata.title: TN3184: Adding data collection details to your privacy manifest

inlineContent.text: When you build an app or third-party SDK that collects any data type, perform these steps in your
For each data type your app or third-party SDK collects, add a dictionary as a value for the
The dictionary includes the data type, the data linked to the user and tracking status, and a list
of reasons for collecting this data type. For more information, see

inlineContent.overridingTitle: Add a collected data type and reasons dictionary

overridingTitleInlineContent.text: Add a collected data type and reasons dictionary

inlineContent.text: For more information about the privacy manifest and these keys, see

inlineContent.overridingTitle: Describing data use in privacy manifests

overridingTitleInlineContent.text: Describing data use in privacy manifests

inlineContent.text: This document describes how to add the
in Xcode. If you work outside of Xcode, review this document to learn about the expected structure of each key.
Before you start adding the keys to your privacy manifest, enable raw keys and values in Xcode to view
the raw keys and hide their human-readable names. Click anywhere in the privacy manifest, then choose Xcode > Editor > Raw Keys and Values.
Repeat the process to disable this feature.

Select a data type from the pop-up menu in the Value column. For possible values, see “Report the categories of data your app or third-party SDK collects“

status, a tracking status, and a list of reasons for collecting this data type. The dictionary contains

abstract.text: Declare the data collected by your app or by third-party SDKs.

doc://com.apple.documentation/documentat.title: Describing data use in privacy manifests

abstract.text: Describe the data your app or third-party SDK collects and the reasons required APIs it uses.
Learn about specific development topics through these in-depth technical articles.

doc://com.apple.technotes/documentation/.title: Technotes

identifying the underlying causes of common errors and explore their
potential solutions.

your website by identifying the underlying causes of common errors and explore
their potential solutions.
